explanation: [0-0] On a table covered with a purple sheet, there is a black and white checkered shirt and a pair of blue jeans. The shirt is spread out on top of the jeans, its sleeves naturally unfolded. On the right side stands a person wearing a white top, with both hands placed on the clothes.

[0-8] The two hands first fold the left side of the checkered shirt to the middle, laying the sleeve flat on top. Then, they fold the right side to the middle, also laying the sleeve flat on top. Next, they fold the shirt from bottom to top, and then fold it again. The shirt is then flipped over with the collar facing up and placed to the left of the jeans.
